forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 18C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 64F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
